amendatorysection.catchline: Health district; political subdivision deemed fully compensated; when.
amendatorysection.para: Each governmental subdivision shall be deemed fully compensated for all real or personal property, possession of which has been turned over to the health district, and for all expense incurred in the organization of the health district, by the assumption and performance by the health district of the duties and obligations of such governmental subdivision in regard to public health and the remedial care and treatment of the indigent sick people.
